text: Elisabeth S. Vrba (May 27, 1942 â€“ February 5, 2025) was an American paleontologist. She worked at Yale University. She created the turnover-pulse hypothesis. Vrba died in New Haven, Connecticut, on February 5, 2025 at the age of 82. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2025 deaths Category:American paleontologists Category:Scientists from Hamburg Category:Scientists from New Haven, Connecticut
